comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: This article: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decena_tr%c3%a1gica places the date of this picture as February, 1913.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: captainslack:  Thanks for bringing the date to our attention.  We'll be sure to include it next time we update the record.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: There's a close-up view of this photo in the Getti Research Library Digital Collection.  Correponds to the upper right 4th of this picture.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
Madero was arrested along with vice-president Pino Suárez, and both were jailed in the intendencia room of Nationanal Palace. They were taken to the penitentiary known as Lecumberri Palace, and slained  behind its back wall, on February 22, 1913.
Roberto Duarte M D
